Instruction: Knead the dough briefly on a floured surface until smooth. Roll out to 1/8-inch thickness and cut into the desired shapes.
Roll out dough into a rectangle approximately 1/4 inch thick. Cut into pieces of your desired size.
In a large frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Cook each rolled out dough until puffed and golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes per side. Drain on paper towels.
Transfer to a plate and keep warm while you repeat the process with the remaining dough.
Keep the stacked tortillas warm by wrapping them in a clean dish towel.
